pageContext.claim: “In Democrat-controlled cities across the U.S.A. violent mobs of liberals are rioting and looting. They are attacking police. [The text in this video is accompanied by a clip of Nancy Pelosi saying, 'I just don't even know why there aren't uprisings all over the country. And maybe there will be.']”
pageContext.analysis: The mostly peaceful protests over police brutality are taking place in cities across the country run by officials from both parties. The video Trump tweeted uses quotes with improper context and deceptively edits them with imagery from the demonstrations, skewing the original meaning of the remarks.
